vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μετρ-ητής, οῦ, ὁ,
measurer, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; μετρηταὶ στρατοπέδων, = Latin metatores castrorum, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II a liquid measure, = {ἀμφορεύς}, [Refs 5th c.BC+] “*Mens.” 9, etc.; of the Hebrew bath, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
measure (about nine or ten gallons)
primarily a measurer; also, metretes, Latin metreta, equivalent to the Attic ἀμφορεύς, i.e., three-fourths of the Attic μέδιμνος, and therefore equal to about nine gallons, Jn. 2:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: medida (una medida de líquido entre 34 a 38 litros)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 容量單位, 約9加侖或40公升 (約 2:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 容量单位, 约9加仑或40公升 (约 2:6)
